question: Assalamualaykum.Can you please tell me any dua which a wife could recite for her husband to be contented and pleased with her.
answer:
QUESTION
I am trying to do my best to keep my husband happy .No matter how hard I try to do things he likes,he is still displeased and unhappy with me.I love him a lot and love to serve him the best.Please suggest any dua from which he will be contented and happy with me.Thankyou.Please remember me in your prayers.Jazakallahu Khirun.
ANSWER


Share:
1. Recite 'Yaa Wadood' in abundance.
2. Recite the following verse of the Qur'aan 41 times, blow on sugar and
give it to your husband to eat (or you may put it into his tea, etc.) The
verse is 'Wa alqaytu alayka mahabbatan .' (Surah Taha verse 39 Juz16)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
FATWA DEPT.

CHECKED AND APPROVED: Mufti Ebrahim Desai
